EmailTemplate.name: Apr30Webinar-AffordableCare.Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Attending - Resources from our Affordable Care Act Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
Thank you for attending MBO's webinar titled "Understanding Project Economy Dynamics: Affordable Care Act and Other Factors Affecting the Use of Independent Consultants" held on Tuesday, April 30. Jay Lash, VP of Market Strategies at MBO Partners - Enterprise Solutions, hosted a conversation between industry specialists Eric Rumbaugh and Steve King about pending legislation and regulation changes affecting independent contractor engagement. Below you will find related material. We hope you find it informative: Webinar Recording <http://video.mbopartners.com/players/kmQnLfq1-mMm4x1IW.html> Webinar Slide Deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Project%20Economy%20Webinar%204.30.13.pdf> <http://sig.org/webinars.php> Connect with Eric <http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=32043678&locale=en_US&trk=tyah> Connect with Steve <http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=163867&locale=en_US&trk=tyah2>
